Text: Tuesday's losses furthered a brutal sell-off in these cannabis leaders' shares, which have now fallen 51%, 48%, and 25%, respectively, over the past year.
Effect: a brutal sell-off in these cannabis leaders' shares, which have now fallen 51%, 48%, and 25%, respectively, over the past year.
Sentence: <e1>Tuesday's losses</e1> furthered <e2>a brutal sell-off in these cannabis leaders' shares, which have now fallen 51%, 48%, and 25%, respectively, over the past year.</e2>
